analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/28/0xc9e86029bd081af490ce39a3bcb1bccf99d33cff.sol:
	Contract DiipCoin has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/28/0xc9e86029bd081af490ce39a3bcb1bccf99d33cff.sol#147-148)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/28/0xc9e86029bd081af490ce39a3bcb1bccf99d33cff.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.21 (/unique_chucks/28/0xc9e86029bd081af490ce39a3bcb1bccf99d33cff.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/28/0xc9e86029bd081af490ce39a3bcb1bccf99d33cff.sol#92) is not in mixedCase

Parameter '_value' of DiipCoin.transferAndCall (/unique_chucks/28/0xc9e86029bd081af490ce39a3bcb1bccf99d33cff.sol#235) is not in mixedCase
